channel.title: How do i change Xp given by slayer monsters?
channel.description: Need help on doing it, im new to this so make it as understandeble as you can please :) all advice appreciated

item.title: How do i change Xp given by slayer monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Open NPCHandler.java (not .cfg) Then search
addSkillXP

This should bring u to the slayer monsters or u can search

“You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one.”

Which should get you to the same place lol

Anyway the numbers after addSkillXP are the amount of exp u get from each type of slayer monster just change them lol

Also if u wanna add a new task just copy

if (npcs[i].npcType == 100 && temp.taskID == 100) { temp.addSkillXP(3500, 18); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to Vannaka to get a new one."); } }

And paste that below the last close brackets of the First one and change the npctupe and taskid to the npc id u want for the task then put the amount of xp u want them to have

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change Xp given by slayer monsters?
